content: We’re also focused on adding infrastructure to assist in our growth, investments in HR, and technology and market analytics that will help us scale and add value to our larger customers, while also helping us to operate as an efficient team with a relentless focus on delivering value. In this quarter alone, we’ve made great strides in growing and improving our HR team, while also making significant investments in market and health care analytics, adding staff and capabilities that will make us faster and help us be more insightful.
